Dear Hr. aoeth,
with regard to the affirmative oooaents of
Mr, Underwood In hie letter of September tl (of which
Mr. Suaserfield haw received a copy) I can inform you
that we are ready to start the cable transmission on
Tuesday October 1, bringing you "European ©view". On
Friday we will transmit the program whioh was original¬
ly titled "life in the Old World8 but has been rebapt¬
ized "Transatlantic -rofile". The change in title was
made after discussions with M Burrows, during his
stay in The Netherlands. Sd feared that the title
"life in the Old World" could lead to the misunder¬
standing that the program deals with historical items,
e thought he had a good point there and we gladly
accepted his suggestion* 8Transatlantic Profile". We
will broadcast both programs to you at 9.1$ p.m. GMT.
sincerely yours,
